roleset.name: arise (from)

example.name: stem-v: headless relative
example.text: Travelers Corp. 's third - quarter net income rose 11 % , even though claims stemming from Hurricane Hugo reduced results $ 40 million .

example.name: stem-v: active transitive
example.text: He also rejected reports that his departure stemmed from disappointment the general manager 's post had n't also led to a board directorship at the London - based news organization .

propbank.arg: from disappointment the general manager 's post had n't also led to a board directorship at the London - based news organization

example.name: stem-n: arg2
example.text: For some uncontrollable reason ( it may be a stem of his OCD ) he feels the need to do this , and WANTS to be caught .

roleset.note: STEM-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Comparison with 'come'. Member of VNcls appear-48.1.1. (from stem.01-v)
STEM-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on stem-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls appear-48.1.1 (from stem.01-n)

roleset.name: cause to stop (often flowing, as a liquid)

example.name: stem-v: like holding back the tide
example.text: If the company can start to ship during this quarter , it could stem some , if not all of the red ink , he said .

propbank.arg: some , if not all of the red ink

example.name: stem-n: arg1
example.text: You could have the multiple bandages stack the regen rate but then have it completely stop once it reaches the level just above the bleed point , therefore trading off the use of multiple bandages with a quicker stem of the bleeding ?

roleset.note: STEM-V NOTES: No applicable VNcls. (from stem.02-v)
STEM-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on stem-v.02. No VNcls. (from stem.02-n)

roleset.name: pointing skis inward in order to slow down

example.name: make_stem-l
example.text: He could n't stand on the top ski and separate out the processes involved and so ended up using two legs to make a stem again before then standing on the top ski - which of course changed nothing .

propbank.arg: before then standing on the top ski - which of course changed nothing

roleset.note: STEM-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. No VNcls. (from stem.03-n)
